name: Beret Boys
description:
Beret boys is just a dumb little 2D arcade shooter game I made for a university project, allowing you to move around and shoot at  enemies, melee and shooter. The map is randomly generated every time you load up, and progress to a new level,  as well as the amount of enemies. Features BGM and SFX as well as UI indicating your health, Enemies remaining, progress through the level and your current Score.

Definitely leave a comment on what you think!
